title: Pool with a view
caption: Summer winds down in Australia
desc: We’re still coming out of a long winter here in the UK so let’s warm up a bit with this bird’s eye view of swimmers enjoying a dip in Bronte Baths, a seaside pool in a suburb of Sydney. Here you can cool off while enjoying stunning beachside views and listening to the waves crash against the rocks outside.
copyright: Bird's-eye view of Bronte Baths ocean pool outside Sydney, Australia (© Shay Cooper/Media Drum World/Cavan Images)
